languages.text: {n}Еретики расположились повсюду, и еще многие, без сомнения, скрываются в проходах, уходящих из зала. Все они пока что сосредоточены на кощунственном истязании техножреца и не замечают вас.{/n}

{n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Еретики расположились повсюду, и еще многие, без сомнения, скрываются в проходах, уходящих из зала. Все они пока что сосредоточены на кощунственном истязании техножреца и не замечают вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they're all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and aren't noticing you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Ketzer haben überall Position bezogen, und gewiss verbergen sich noch viele weitere in den Gängen, die aus der Halle führen. Vorerst sind sie alle auf die frevlerische Folter des Techpriesters konzentriert und bemerken dich nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Ketzer haben überall Position bezogen, und gewiss verbergen sich noch viele weitere in den Gängen, die aus der Halle führen. Vorerst sind sie alle auf die frevlerische Folter des Techpriesters konzentriert und bemerken dich nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les hérétiques ont pris position partout et de nombreux autres doivent se cacher dans les passages qui mènent hors de la salle. Pour l'instant, ils ont les yeux rivés sur le technoprêtre en train de se faire torturer et ne vous remarquent pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les hérétiques ont pris position partout et de nombreux autres doivent se cacher dans les passages qui mènent hors de la salle. Pour l'instant, ils ont les yeux rivés sur le technoprêtre en train de se faire torturer et ne vous remarquent pas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}到处都是异端分子。毫无疑问，还有更多人藏在大厅的通道里。目前所有人都在专心致志地折磨那位技术神甫，进行亵渎之举，没有注意到你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}到处都是异端分子。毫无疑问，还有更多人藏在大厅的通道里。目前所有人都在专心致志地折磨那位技术祭司，进行亵渎之举，没有注意到你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異端者はいたるところに陣取っており、間違いなくそれ以上の人間がホールの外へ通じる通路の見えないところにいるのがわかる。今のところ、罰当たりにもその場にいる全員が技術司祭を夢中で拷問しているため、こちらには気づいていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異端者があちこちで場所を取っていて、間違いなくそれ以上の人間がホールの外へ通じる通路の見えないところにいる。今のところ、その場の全員が罰当たりにも技術司祭を夢中で拷問していて、こちらには気づいていない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los herejes han tomado posiciones por todas partes, y sin duda hay muchos más escondidos en los pasadizos que salen de la sala. Por ahora están concentrados en la sacrílega tortura del Tecnosacerdote y no se fijan en ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los herejes han tomado posiciones por todas partes, y sin duda hay muchos más escondidos en los pasadizos que salen de la sala. Por ahora están concentrados en la sacrílega tortura del Tecnosacerdote y no se fijan en ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kâfirler hemen her yerde konuşlanmış. Daha da fazlasının salondan dışarı uzanan geçitlerde saklandığı aşikâr. Şimdilik hepsi; Tekno Rahip'e yapılan, kutsalı ayaklar altına alan işkenceye odaklı olduğundan seni fark etmiyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The heretics have taken up positions everywhere, and many more are doubtlessly hiding in the passages leading out of the hall. For now, they are all focused on the sacrilegious torture of the Tech-Priest and do not notice you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kâfirler hemen her yerde konumlanmış. Daha da fazlasının salondan çıkılan geçitlerde saklandığı aşikâr. Şimdilik hepsi, Tekno Rahip'in inancına küfürler yağdıran işkenceye odaklanmış durumda olduğundan seni fark etmiyorlar.{/n}
